body_html:
Thank you for the bug report!

This doesn't error out on Variables:

import torch
from torch.autograd import Variable
a = Variable(torch.zeros(3, 4))
a1, a2, a3 = torch.unbind(a, 0)
a1 = a1.pin_memory()

The RuntimeError with tensors will be fixed when Tensor and Variable are merged.

body:
Thank you for the bug report!

This doesn't error out on `Variable`s:
```
import torch
from torch.autograd import Variable
a = Variable(torch.zeros(3, 4))
a1, a2, a3 = torch.unbind(a, 0)
a1 = a1.pin_memory()
```
The RuntimeError with tensors will be fixed when Tensor and Variable are merged.
